name: Globus
overview: Here we are in 2017 and still previously unknown games appear with VERY interesting stories. This is very much the case with Globus, it was created by Paco Lafuente back in 1987 but unpublished until now. In addition to making the game available Paco tells his story and supplies some historical artifacts. Enjoy the story, we did HISTORY of Globus by Paco Lafuente This is the story of Globus, a game for ZX Spectrum developed by me between 1986 and 1987 that was never released to the market.
